campaign_name: T2MD | Search | Trees Port 150 16/6 Ai 4/8 Lemon paused 20/8 131 3/9
verification_query: SELECT campaign_criterion.keyword.text, campaign_criterion.keyword.match_type FROM campaign_criterion WHERE campaign.id = 598475433 AND campaign_criterion.negative = TRUE AND campaign_criterion.keyword.text IN ('olive trees', 'tree gifts uk')
rollback_instructions: If deployment fails, no rollback needed - keywords were not added. If deployment succeeds but needs reversal, manually remove the 2 added negative keywords via Google Ads UI.
